SELECT M.ID AS moduleId, M.PARENT_ID AS parentId, M.TITLE AS title, M.SORT AS sort, M.URL AS url, M.DESCRIPTION AS description, P.DESCRIPTION AS permissionDescription, M.MODULE_NO AS moduleNo, CAST(M.OPEN_FLAG as SIGNED INTEGER) AS openFlag, R.RES_STRING AS pageNo, M.DEFAULT_MODEL AS defaultInto, M.CREATE_DATE AS createDatetime, M.MODIFY_DATE AS updateDatetime, CAST(P.PERMISSION_FLAG as SIGNED INTEGER) AS permissionFlag FROM SYS_MODULE M, SYS_PERMISSION P, SYS_PERMIS_RES PR, SYS_RESOURCE R WHERE M.ID = P.MODULE_ID AND P.ID = PR.PERMISSION_ID AND R.ID = PR.RESOURCE_ID AND P.PERMISSION_FLAG = '0' AND M.OPEN_FLAG = 1 AND R.RES_STRING IN ( SELECT RES_STRING FROM SYS_RESOURCE WHERE id IN (SELECT spr.RESOURCE_ID FROM SYS_PERMIS_RES spr WHERE spr.PERMISSION_ID IN (SELECT srp.PERMISSION_ID FROM SYS_ROLE_PERMIS srp WHERE srp.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT sur.ROLE_ID FROM SYS_USER_ROLE sur , SYS_ROLE sr WHERE sur.ROLE_ID = sr.id AND sur.USER_ID = (SELECT id FROM SYS_USER su WHERE su.USERNAME=#{userName} AND OPEN_FLAG = '1' limit 0,1 ) AND sr.OPEN_FLAG='1' ) ) ) ) ORDER BY CAST( SORT as SIGNED INTEGER)

SELECT M.TITLE AS title, M.SORT AS sort, M.URL AS url, M.DESCRIPTION AS description, P.DESCRIPTION AS permissionDescription, M.MODULE_NO AS moduleNo, CAST(M.OPEN_FLAG as SIGNED INTEGER) AS openFlag, R.RES_STRING AS operateNo, M.CREATE_DATE AS createDatetime, M.MODIFY_DATE AS updateDatetime, CAST(P.PERMISSION_FLAG as SIGNED INTEGER) AS permissionFlag FROM SYS_MODULE M, SYS_PERMISSION P, SYS_PERMIS_RES PR, SYS_RESOURCE R WHERE M.ID = P.MODULE_ID AND P.ID = PR.PERMISSION_ID AND R.ID = PR.RESOURCE_ID AND P.PERMISSION_FLAG = '1' AND R.RES_STRING IN ( SELECT RES_STRING FROM SYS_RESOURCE WHERE ID IN (SELECT spr.RESOURCE_ID FROM SYS_PERMIS_RES spr WHERE spr.PERMISSION_ID IN (SELECT srp.PERMISSION_ID FROM SYS_ROLE_PERMIS srp WHERE srp.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT sur.ROLE_ID FROM SYS_USER_ROLE sur , SYS_ROLE sr WHERE sur.ROLE_ID = sr.id AND sur.USER_ID = (SELECT ID FROM SYS_USER su WHERE su.username=#{userName} AND OPEN_FLAG = '1' limit 0,1 ) AND sr.OPEN_FLAG='1' ) ) ) ) ORDER BY CAST( SORT as SIGNED INTEGER)
